metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15213 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.2.3. There is a use-after-free caused by a malicious USB device in the drivers/media/usb/dvb-usb/dvb-usb-init.c driver.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Setting priority to low since this issue requires a malicious USB device to be inserted into the system Ben Hutchings noticed that commit 6cf97230cd5f ("media: dvb: usb: fix use after free in dvb_usb_device_exit"), which is mentioned in the CVE references for this issue, likely doesn't fix the problem. See the lore reference above for details. I think Ben is correct and have adjusted our break-fix metadata to use the break commit that he pointed out.
